title: Roast fore rib of beef, roasted potatoes and Yorkshire pudding
description: James Martin brings you the perfect recipe for an extra special Sunday roast beef. Push the boat out and make your own Yorkshire puddings and gravy.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
4kg/8lb 8oz, 3 bone fore rib 28 day aged beef
10 King Edward potatoes, peeled and cut into 2 or 3
50g/1¾oz lard, beef dripping or vegetable oil
